text: Hasbro Entertainment is an American production and distribution company that is a division of American toy and multimedia company Hasbro, It is the successor of Hasbro Studios/Allspark following the sale of the majority of Entertainment One's assets (except for its family brands division, which has been folded into Hasbro) to Lionsgate on December 27, 2023. Category:American animation studios Category:American entertainment companies Category:Companies based in Burbank, California
title: Hasbro Entertainment
